title: Dante's Divine Comedy - Lectures - The Teaching Company
description:
All 12 discs. ~12 hours in length. Mp3. Cheesy applause between lectures but good content.  

COURSE DESCRIPTION:

Two gifted teachers share the fruit of two lifetimes' worth of historical and literary expertise in this introduction to one of the greatest works ever written. One of the most profound and satisfying of all poems, the Divine Comedy (or Commedia) of Dante Alighieri (1265Ã¢â‚¬â€œ1321) is a book for life.
